comment_0: I have played this song while drunk and it will make you cry especially if you are ending a romance
comment_1: never seen such a somber sinatra song.
comment_2: Pretty obvious. Nostalgia. Give me a drink for the pain i've felt and the pain ahead. sad :(
comment_3: Listen to this one back to back with Drinkin'Again (also by Frank) to drown your sorrows of failed romance.
